Author: glx#4214
Content: @bishop @joe2x4 @Deleted User - all, I think maybe you are not understanding the current review we are doing in terms of how we might pivot, or maybe you didn't read my full article.  We are exploring potential options because the alt coin market is in the toilet and I mentioned in my article does each platform really need their own token when making simple payments such as monthly subscription fees can be done using BTC, ETH, etc.  We are certainly not trying to launch a colored coin on the BTC network.  We are a US based company and have other options for raising capital to continue to build our network.  As I mentioned in my article the biggest threat is SEC intervention which can shut a startup down completely.  That certainly will not help me get the company where I know it can go.  I am also not sure that anyone here besides @Cryptoon and @siu - Chainmakers knows much about the GLX.com network or what I am trying to build.  I invite you to log in there and connect with me to chat directly.

Author: glx#4214
Content: @Seko - I am sorry for any confusion in the marketplace.  Truthfully I have never even checked any of my wallets on the marketmaker nodes to know if any contributions came in.  This is actually very pleasant for me to here that there has been some interest.  I have asked people to sign into GLX and chat with me there either directly or in the GLX Token group.  I am happy to refund any tokens that were sent in.   We are going to be creating a security token backed by shares in our company and can issue those in receipt of the utility tokens or again can provide a full refund.

Author: glx#4214
Content: @Alright - on the network token side that is exactly what we planned on doing and are going to continue to do.  The fact that I stated we may look at some other options is just show further support to my existing investors that our choice to go with Komodo is still the most intelligent.

Content: @Seko - Please try to direct anyone using the word "scam" to my attention.  The idea of that is a total joke.  Many ICO projects that have raised money have shut down or disappeared completely with no sign.  We are a real company with a real working platform.  We have audited financial statements with plans of going public on the NASDAQ or a regulated token exchange.  Anyone saying this knows nothing about GLX.

Author: glx#4214
Content: We have been working very hard behind the scenes.  I appreciate everyones support.  I will try to do a better job of keeping the community informed.  We are standing by Komodo 100% to power our platform.  We are going to develop some very cool stuff very fast.  All one has to do is go to our Labs page and see the impressive way in which we position GLX and the Komodo platform to understand what is to come - https://glx.co/labs.

Author: glx#4214
Content: To stay clear of regulatory scrutiny we are not going to execute the dICO to raise funds to expand development.  We will do that with our equity.  We are going to refund everyones contributions in full and also let you keep the GLX Tokens.  As many of you know Benny Fairbank and I are good friends and he is on our advisory board.  I will be working closely with him and Chainmakers to create many different airdrops and ways to give away half of our token supply to the member base.  I would really appreciate any help and ideas from the whole Komodo community as well.
